participant_1.background:
I'm not too concerned with my appearance.
I have a busy life, but I manage to keep my priorities straight.
I have never been arrested, but I have been warned by the police for riding my horse too fast.
i like to think about what it would be like to be an artist.
I love fresh seafood and vegetables from the Pacific Northwest.

participant_2.background:
I finally got a new graphics card for my computer so I can play Quake at a higher resolution!
I sell insurance in Hollywood with my brother in law.
i never cook.
I like to walk around and listen to music to clear my head.
i try to find easy ways to make money.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks. How are you?
I'm good. I'm just trying to figure out what to do with my life.
I hear you. I'm in the same boat. I've been thinking about going back to school, but I'm not sure if that's what I really want to do.
Yeah, I've been thinking about going back to school too, but I'm not sure what I want to study.
I think it's important to find something that you're passionate about and that you'll enjoy doing.
I agree. I just don't know what that is yet.
Well, if you figure it out, let me know. I'm still trying to figure it out myself.
Will do. Thanks for talking with me.
No problem. It was nice talking to you.
You too. Have a good night.
